content:
Captain America: The First Avenger is an excellent starting point. Watching the MCU movies in chronological order can be a fun and unique way to experience the story.

Here's a list of the MCU movies in chronological order to help you plan your marathon:

1. Captain America: The First Avenger (2011) - Set during World War II
2. Captain Marvel (2019) - Set in the 1990s
3. Iron Man (2008) - Set in 2009
4. The Incredible Hulk (2008) - Set in 2009, concurrently with Iron Man
5. Iron Man 2 (2010) - Set in 2010
6. Thor (2011) - Set in 2011
7. The Avengers (2012) - Set in 2012
8. Iron Man 3 (2013) - Set in 2012-2013
9. Thor: The Dark World (2013) - Set in 2013
10. Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014) - Set in 2014
11. Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) - Set in 2014
12. Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015) - Set in 2015
13. Ant-Man (2015) - Set in 2015
14. Captain America: Civil War (2016) - Set in 2016
15. Doctor Strange (2016) - Set in 2016-2017
16. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017) - Set in 2017
17. Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) - Set in 2017
18. Thor: Ragnarok (2017) - Set in 2017
19. Black Panther (2018) - Set in 2017
20. Avengers: Infinity War (2018) - Set in 2017-2018
21. Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018) - Set in 2018
22. Avengers: Endgame (2019) - Set in 2023
23. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019) - Set in 2023

Feel free to take breaks whenever you need to, and enjoy your Marvel movie marathon!
